text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar You know who's an awesome leader through this whole coronavirus (Governor Cuomo)! Going on everyday being totally honest with you American people! Not worried about rating our your fake news! He's just worried about the American people in his New Yorkers! Thank you Governor Cuomo
